text: Cherkasy () is the name of several rural localities in Russia. ==Modern localities== *Cherkasy, Chelyabinsk Oblast, a settlement in Polotsky Selsoviet of Kizilsky District in Chelyabinsk Oblast *Cherkasy, Republic of Karelia, a village in Medvezhyegorsky District of the Republic of Karelia ==Alternative names== *Cherkasy, alternative name of Cherkassy, a selo in Cherkassky Selsoviet of Yeletsky District in Lipetsk Oblast; ==See also== *Cherkassy, Russia, several rural localities in Russia
title: Cherkasy, Russia
